00049 typedef struct thread_limit_def
00050 {
00051   size_t max_total;     
00052   size_t min_spare;     
00053   size_t max_spare;     
00054 } thread_limit;
00055 
00057 extern thread_limit network_thread_limit;
00058 
00060 extern thread_limit kernel_thread_limit;
00061 
00063 extern thread_limit update_thread_limit;
00064 
00066 typedef enum thread_state_def
00067 {
00068   THREAD_DEAD,          
00069   THREAD_DYING,         
00070   THREAD_IDLE,          
00071   THREAD_BUSY           
00072 } thread_state;
00073 
00074 struct fd_data_def;
00075 
00077 typedef struct network_thread_data_def
00078 {
00079   DC *dc;                               
00080   call_args args;                       
00081   direction dir;                        
00082   struct fd_data_def *fd_data;          
00083   unsigned int generation;              
00084   unsigned int index;                   
00085 } network_thread_data;
00086 
00088 typedef struct kernel_thread_data_def
00089 {
00090   void *buf;                            
00091   size_t buf_size;
00092   struct fuse_chan *fuse_ch;
00093 } kernel_thread_data;
00094 
00096 typedef struct update_thread_data_def
00097 {
00099   zfs_fh fh;
00101   bool slow;
00102 } update_thread_data;
00103 
00105 typedef struct thread_def
00106 {
00108   pthread_mutex_t mutex;
00109 
00111   thread_state state;
00112 
00114   size_t index;
00115 
00117   pthread_t thread_id;
00118 
00120   semaphore sem;
00121 
00122   DC *dc_call;                  
00123   DC *dc_reply;                 
00124   int32_t retval;               
00125   uint32_t from_sid;            
00128   union {
00129     network_thread_data network;
00130     kernel_thread_data kernel;
00131     update_thread_data update;
00132   } u; //FIXME: none or meaningfull name
00133 } thread;
00134 
00136 typedef union padded_thread_def
00137 {
00138   thread t;
00139   char padding[((sizeof (thread) + 255) / 256) * 256];
00140 } padded_thread;
00141 
00143 typedef void *(*thread_start) (void *);
00144 
00146 typedef void (*thread_init) (thread *);
00147 
00149 typedef struct thread_pool_def
00150 {
00151   volatile bool terminate;      
00153   size_t min_spare_threads;     
00154   size_t max_spare_threads;     
00155   size_t size;                  
00156   void *unaligned_array;        
00157   padded_thread *threads;       
00158   pthread_mutex_t mutex;        
00159   queue idle;                   
00160   queue empty;                  
00161   thread_start worker_start;    
00162   thread_init worker_init;      
00164   /* Data for main thread.  */
00165   volatile pthread_t main_thread;       
00166   pthread_mutex_t main_in_syscall;      
00168   /* Data for thread pool regulator.  */
00169   volatile pthread_t regulator_thread;  
00170   pthread_mutex_t regulator_in_syscall; 
00171 } thread_pool;
00172 
00174 typedef struct waiting4reply_data_def
00175 {
00176   uint32_t request_id;
00177   thread *t;
00178   fibnode node;
00179 } waiting4reply_data;
